issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The build system uses babel to transpile and generate the source maps. One of the args is the {{sourceRoot}} which is set to an absolute path. This absolute path gets baked into the generated files which is undesirable.

Need to see if we can do relative paths. If that doesn't work, perhaps we need rewrite all of the generated source maps.
fields.summary: appcd-gulp: Local directories are baked into source maps
